page.title: 19Law and Order in Inchnadamph
page.content: The main reason the policeman is called out is to the{mountain rescue post to help co-ordinate rescues and standby to call in other rescue services. He also watches{sheep {dipping,}briefs{special constables}(2 resident here) and trains children for cycling proficiency.{Poaching}is the worst thing that happens in Inchnadamph , though it is rarer now. The value of{red deer is 85p per {pound, the value of salmon is up to Â£3 {per pound.}The worst event this year was a caravan blaze beside the hotel. The contents were worth approximately Â£1,600). The cause was thought to be electrical. In general the policeman only makes patrols of the area. Generally the folk in Inchnadamph are very law abiding
